item.title: 法国最大的谷物港口可能因罢工而受到更多干扰
item.description: 法国码头工人工会号召在全国所有港口举行一系列罢工，这可能会减缓欧盟最大农业生产国的谷物出口。【原文：A French dock workers union called a series of strikes covering all of the country’s ports, potentially slowing grain exports in the European Union’s biggest agricultural producer.】

item.title: 投票在即，加纳投资者同意提前偿还能源债务
item.description: 在本周的一次会议之后，加纳的债权人同意提前偿还所有未偿还的能源债券。【原文：Ghana’s creditors have agreed to an early repayment of all outstanding energy bonds, following a meeting this week.】

item.title: 阿波罗在能源转型中看到了 50 万亿美元的商机
item.description: 私人资本公司阿波罗全球管理公司的合伙人莱斯利-马彭德拉（Leslie Mapondera）认为，"工业复兴 "是未来几十年价值 50 万亿美元的能源转型投资机会的一部分。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. sees an “industrial renaissance” emerging as part of an energy transition investment opportunity worth $50 trillion over the coming decades, according to Leslie Mapondera, a partner at the private capital firm.】

item.title: 德国政府计划提供约 20 亿欧元的新芯片补贴
item.description: 在英特尔公司搁置在马格德堡建造价值 300 亿欧元（320 亿美元）芯片工厂的计划两个月后，德国政府正准备向该国的半导体产业投资数十亿欧元。【原文：The German government is preparing billions of euros of new investments into the nation’s semiconductor industry, two months after Intel Corp. shelved plans to build a €30 billion ($32 billion) chip factory in Magdeburg.】

item.title: 墨西哥银行成员就通胀前景提出更大幅度的关键利率下调建议
item.description: 在密切关注的核心通胀继续放缓之际，墨西哥央行表示愿意考虑更大幅度的降息，但没有设定具体的时间框架。【原文：Mexico’s central bank signaled willingness to consider bigger interest rate cuts without setting a specific time-frame for doing so, as closely-watched core inflation continues to slow.】

item.title: 雷诺在中国掀起招聘热潮，在国内大力推广电动汽车
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）正试图通过在一个甚至没有汽车销售的国家--中国--拓展业务，在需求低迷之际加强电动汽车业务。【原文：Renault SA is trying to strengthen its electric-vehicle business at a time of flagging demand by building up its footprint in a country where it doesn’t even sell cars — China.】

item.title: 谷歌支持的 R2 获得 5900 万美元股权和债务用于贷款
item.description: R2 是一家为该地区科技公司开发贷款工具的拉美初创公司，该公司通过股权和债务融资筹集了 5900 万美元，用于继续扩大业务，包括推动智利业务的发展。【原文：R2, a Latin American startup building lending tools for tech companies in the region, raised $59 million in equity and debt to continue expanding operations, including a push to grow its business in Chile.】

item.title: T+1 "股票交割方式的转变如何影响市场
item.description: 即使在即时通信和实时金融数据时代，投资者也不得不等待数天才能获得所购股票的所有权或收到所售股票的付款。现在不再如此。自 5 月 28 日以来，美国股票交易的 "结算 "时间从两天缩短为一天。全球银行、经纪商和投资者不得不重新审视他们所有的交易后技术和程序，以确保他们为新的股票交易速度做好准备。这一变化给投资者带来了特殊的挑战【原文：Even in an age of instant communication and live financial data, investors have had to wait days to take ownership of the stocks they purchased or to receive payment for the stocks they sold. No longer. Since May 28, US stock trades have “settled” in one day rather than two. Global banks, brokers and investors were forced to review all of their post-trade technologies and procedures to ensure they were ready for the new pace of stock trading. The change has posed a special challenge to investors】

item.title: 特朗普大选前外资稳步进入加拿大
item.description: 第三季度对加拿大的外国直接投资保持稳定，这是一个令人鼓舞的迹象，表明即使在美国大选前不确定性增加的情况下，企业仍继续将资金留在这个北方国家。【原文：Foreign direct investment into Canada remained steady in the third quarter, an encouraging sign that businesses continued to park capital in the northern nation even as uncertainty mounted ahead of the US election.】

item.title: Glencore 与 Pele Green 达成 1.16 亿美元太阳能发电厂协议
item.description: Glencore Plc 的南非铁合金部门及其合资伙伴 Merafe Resources Ltd. 与 Pele Green Energy 达成了一项协议，将建造一座耗资 21 亿兰特（1.16 亿美元）的公用事业规模可再生能源发电厂。【原文：Glencore Plc’s South African ferroalloys division and its joint venture partner Merafe Resources Ltd. agreed a deal with Pele Green Energy to build a 2.1 billion rand ($116 million) utility-scale renewable energy plant.】

item.title: 巴尼耶让步，勒庞党提出更多预算要求
item.description: 在法国总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）做出关键让步，放弃提高电力税的计划后，玛丽娜-勒庞的国民自发组织（National Rally）进一步提出了修改法国政府 2025 年预算法案的要求。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s National Rally set out further demands for changes to the French government’s 2025 budget bill after Prime Minister Michel Barnier dropped plans to raise taxes on electricity in a key concession.】

item.title: 阿曼公司取代受制裁的阿尔罗萨公司入股安哥拉钻石开采商
item.description: 一家阿曼国家支持的基金从俄罗斯阿尔罗萨股份公司收购了安哥拉Catoca钻石开采合资企业的股份。【原文：An Omani state-backed fund has acquired shares in Angola’s Catoca diamond-mining joint venture from Russia’s Alrosa PJSC.】

item.title: 加拿大顶级信用社计划进行以银行为重点的改革
item.description: 加拿大魁北克省以外最大的信用社万科历来将自己定位为 "主街，而非华尔街"；由会员所有、以价值观为主导、以本地为重点。【原文：Canada’s biggest credit union outside of Quebec, Vancity, has historically marketed itself as being “Main Street, not Wall Street” — member-owned, values-led and locally focused.】

item.title: Yubico 在斯德哥尔摩主要市场上市以吸引大客户
item.description: 网络安全公司 Yubico AB 计划于下月初在纳斯达克斯德哥尔摩主板市场上市，以提高公司对其最大客户的吸引力。【原文：Cybersecurity firm Yubico AB plans to list on Nasdaq Inc.’s main Stockholm market early next month to make the firm more attractive to its largest clients.】

item.title: 法雷奥因欧洲竞争力 "大幅 "下降而裁员
item.description: 法雷奥公司（Valeo SA）计划在欧洲裁员约1000人，并关闭在法国的两家工厂，理由是汽车行业前景黯淡，面对中国廉价产品，该公司在该地区失去了竞争力。【原文：Valeo SA plans to cut about 1,000 jobs in Europe and close two plants in France, citing a gloomy outlook for the car industry and a loss of competitiveness in the region in the face of cheaper Chinese products.】

item.title: 英国皇家邮政业主 IDS 因交易批准乐观而接近要约收购价
item.description: 英国皇家邮政拥有者国际配送服务公司（International Distribution Services Plc）的股价升至两年半以来的新高，向丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）的 EP 集团提出的价格靠拢，外界猜测这位捷克亿万富翁将完成收购。【原文：Shares in Royal Mail-owner International Distribution Services Plc rose to a two-and-a-half year high, moving toward a price offered by Daniel Kretinsky’s EP Group on speculation that the Czech billionaire will complete a takeover.】

item.title: 图斯克表示挪威将帮助保护波兰的乌克兰重要援助中心
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）表示，挪威已同意承担保护外国向乌克兰提供军事援助的主要转运中心的一半责任。【原文：Norway has agreed to bear half of the responsibility of protecting the main transit hub for foreign military aid to Ukraine, according to Poland’s Prime Minister Donald Tusk.】

item.title: 南非中央银行对落后的基础设施发出警报
item.description: 南非央行警告说，该国包括供水系统和交通网络在内的基础设施摇摇欲坠，对金融系统构成了重大威胁。【原文：South Africa’s central bank warned the country’s crumbling infrastructure, including its water systems and transport networks, pose a significant threat to the financial system.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行可能需要将利率维持在刺激性水平
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行不需要再限制经济，甚至可能需要将利率提高到促进经济增长的水平。【原文：The European Central Bank doesn’t need to constrain the economy any longer and may even have to take interest rates to levels that promote growth, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 结称欧洲央行必须密切关注供应对经济的冲击
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）说，只要通胀预期保持稳定，欧洲中央银行就可以无视推高物价的供应冲击，但如果存在过度偏离的危险，就应该做出强有力的反应。【原文：The European Central Bank can ignore supply shocks that push up prices as long as inflation expectations hold steady, but should react forcefully if there’s a danger of them deviating excessively, Governing Council member Klaas Knot said.】

item.title: 波兰消费放缓，未来经济增长面临风险
item.description: 波兰的私人消费在第三季度出现下滑，这引发了人们对未来经济增长的疑虑，并增强了加快降息的理由。【原文：Poland’s private consumption faltered in the third quarter, raising doubts over future economic growth and strengthening the case for quicker interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 伊朗石油大亨的对冲基金准备关闭伦敦办事处
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一家据说是伊朗石油交易商侯赛因-沙姆哈尼（Hossein Shamkhani）监管网络一部分的对冲基金已告知其伦敦员工，该公司将进行清算。【原文：A hedge fund that’s said to be part of a network overseen by Iranian oil trader Hossein Shamkhani has told its London employees that the firm will go into liquidation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 干旱过后，津巴布韦农业复苏，经济增长迅猛
item.description: 厄尔尼诺现象引发的干旱抑制了农业产出，刺激了进口需求，挤压了国家财政，津巴布韦政府预计明年经济增长将强劲反弹。【原文：Zimbabwe‘s government expects economic growth to rebound strongly next year as the country recovers from an El Niño-induced drought that’s curbed farm output, fueled demand for imports and squeezed state finances.】

item.title: 德国通胀意外保持稳定，为欧洲央行减息提供支持
item.description: 德国 11 月份的通胀率意外保持不变，为欧洲中央银行继续降低利率提供了支持。【原文：German inflation unexpectedly remained unchanged in November, backing arguments for the European Central Bank to continue lowering interest rates.】

item.title: K-Pop 组合 NewJeans 表示将脱离经纪公司 Hybe
item.description: K-pop 超级明星 NewJeans 正式宣布她们计划与 Hybe Co.【原文：K-pop superstars NewJeans officially declared they plan to part ways with Hybe Co., in a dramatic step that could spark legal battles between the music powerhouse and the girl group.】

item.title: 经济学家解释在美国感恩节该对家人说什么
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们来看看美国银行的感恩节晚餐指南。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at Bank of America’s guide to Thanksgiving dinner. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 卢布暴跌迫使俄罗斯央行加大加息力度
item.description: 卢布最近的暴跌正在加大俄罗斯央行上调关键利率的压力；上调幅度可能是乌克兰战争爆发以来最大的。【原文：A recent slump in the ruble is ramping up pressure on the Bank of Russia to hike its key rate — potentially by the most since the start of the war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 阿德勒称 "有责任 "为利息负担寻找更便宜的融资方式
item.description: Adler 集团表示，该公司正在寻找降低融资成本的方法，因为在两次债务重组之后，这家德国房东正在努力降低融资成本。【原文：Adler Group said it was in the process of looking at ways to lower its financing costs, as the German landlord grapples with steeper funding costs following two debt restructurings.】

item.title: 特朗普的天然气野心对俄罗斯来说是个坏消息
item.description:
维持对莫斯科液化天然气生产的制裁将有助于华盛顿向全世界出售更多的美国燃料。【原文：

Keeping sanctions on Moscow’s LNG production would help Washington sell more US fuel to the world.

】

item.title: 罗马尼亚最高法院下令对总统选举进行重新计票
item.description: 罗马尼亚宪法法院已下令对第一轮总统选举的所有选票进行重新计票。【原文：Romania’s Constitutional Court has ordered a recount of all the votes in the first round of presidential elections that was won by a little-known pro-Russian candidate.】
